design.custom_css: /* Center the logo on android */ .platform-android .header-logo { margin: 0 auto; } .iframelocation { height: 75vw!important; width: 100vw!important; border: none; } .buttonmap { display:block; opacity:1; position:absolute!important; margin-top:75vw; background-color: #bc7d69!important; } .buttoncall { background-color: #bc7d69!important; } .divcontact { padding:10%; text-align:center; } h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,p { color:#565656; } #cff p { width: 90%; margin: 5px 5%; } .page-home-2 .scroll-content { margin-top: 0!important; z-index: 20!important; overflow-y: hidden; } .menuhome { position: absolute; left: 0; z-index:10000; font-size: 2.7rem; margin: 0; padding: 0; min-width: 40px; width:50px; height:50px; color:#999; background-color: #fff; border-radius: 0; } .headerhome { position: absolute; background-image: url(assets/logocovertrans.png) !important; background-size: 250px 150px !important; height: 150px; width:250px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; z-index: 100; left: 0; right: 0; top: 15px; margin: auto; } .headerhome2 { visibility:hidden; } .bghome { width:100%; height:100%; position: absolute; background-image: url(assets/homeshamaya.jpg) !important; background-size: cover!important; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: right bottom; z-index: 99; left: 0; right: 0; top: 0; margin: auto; } .pointerhome { width:100px; height:100px; position: absolute; background-image: url(assets/pointer_enter2.gif) !important; background-size: contain!important; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; z-index: 9999; right: 50%; top: 35%; } p > img { min-width: 100vw; margin-left: -20px; } /*REMOVE HEADER AND TAB ON LANDSCAPE*/ @media only screen and (orientation: landscape) { ion-header.header.header-md > *, ion-header.header.header-ios, div.tabbar.show-tabbar { display: none; } div.fixed-content, div.scroll-content { margin-top: 0 !important; margin-bottom: 0 !important; } .pointerhome { width:100px; height:100px; position: absolute; background-image: url(assets/pointer_enter2.gif) !important; background-size: contain!important; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; z-index: 9999; right: 25%; top: 22%; } .headerhome { visibility:hidden; } .headerhome2 { visibility:visible; position: absolute; background-image: url(assets/logocovertrans2.png) !important; background-size: 50vw 30vw !important; height: 85vh; width:50vw; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center; z-index: 100; left: 5%; } }
